title: As a person that has hated this meta, and has become hating league slowly.....
body: I can't wait until this next patch. Hopefully the game will me fresh and actually fun. (I swear if adc's are still op im legit gonna be so frustrated)

replies.body: adc will imo still be the strongest role in the game as they always were.
Normally they aren't normally its jungle that's strongest, only since ardent meta were adc's the strongest

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GNxfmptx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-05T21:10:02.321+0000)
>
> Normally they aren't normally its jungle that's strongest, only since ardent meta were adc's the strongest

Normally is ADC. Camping botlane as jungler, it is to help your adc get fed so that they can destroy the enemy team with their right clicks. As long as botlane can become fed, any other role getting fed is meaningless as ADC's have itemization that counters any champ they want.
I bet you never complain when your Allie adc does very well.....this is a whining post , nothing more.
